attributes.action: ensure that pornography is not available to view on the internet without internet service providers carrying out adequate proof of age checks to determine that the viewer is 18 years of age or over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Internet Service Providers should be held accountable for providing pornography to those under the age of 18 in a similar way to those who provide printed material. This may include introducing an online proof of age indentifaction system or the compulsory censorship of 'Adult' material unless it be unlocked by application to their ISP.
